action.action-desc: Mr. Feenstra introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Labor

form.official-title: To require disclosure of the total amount of interest that would be paid over the life of a loan for certain Federal student loans.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Student Transparency for Understanding Decisions in Education Net Terms Act or the STUDENT Act.
Section 433(a) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1083(a)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraphs (18) and (19) as paragraphs (19) and (20), respectively; and
by inserting after paragraph (17) the following:
the total amount of interest that would be paid over the life of the loan based on a standard 10-year repayment plan;
